biography: Mikko is a golfer known for his meticulous approach to the game. With a steady hand and an eye for detail, Mikko brings a level of precision to the course that is admired by his peers. Representing Kurk Golf, Mikko's dedication to his craft is evident in every swing.

Having appeared once in past Hector Trophée tournaments, Mikko is familiar with the unique challenges and camaraderie that the event provides. Although he won't be participating in the Hector Trophée 2025, his presence is always felt, and the possibility remains that he could join at the last minute. Known for his thoughtful demeanor off the course, Mikko is a true sportsman and a credit to the game of golf.
